languages.text: "Вероятно". {n}Инквизитор пожимает плечами.{/n} "Если он не страдал от скрытых недугов, то в скором придет в себя, и его здоровье не понесет серьезного ущерба. В любом случае, пребывание в беспамятстве для него куда безопаснее, чем опасная привилегия быть свидетелем этой беседы".

traits.locale_text: "Безусловно, он скоро придет в себя. Я настроен побеседовать с вами без свидетелей, потому шум, который он собирался поднять, был совершенно нежелателен".

languages.text: "Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."
languages.original_text: "Вероятно". {n}Инквизитор пожимает плечами.{/n} "Если он не страдал от скрытых недугов, то в скором придет в себя, и его здоровье не понесет серьезного ущерба. В любом случае, пребывание в беспамятстве для него куда безопаснее, чем опасная привилегия быть свидетелем этой беседы".

traits.locale_text: "Likely." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being privy to this conversation."

"Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

"Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

languages.text: 「おそらく」{n}男は肩をすくめる。{/n}「隠れた病でも患っていない限りは、健康に大きな問題なく意識を取り戻するだろう。いずれにせよ、この会話の目撃者となる危険な権利を得るよりは、意識を喪失する方がはるかに安全な選択だ」
languages.original_text: "Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく」{n}男は肩をすくめる。{/n}「隠れた病でも患っていない限りは、健康に大きな問題なく意識を取り戻するだろう。いずれにせよ、この会話の目撃者となる危険な権利を得るよりは、意識を喪失する方がはるかに安全な選択だ」

languages.original_text: "Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

languages.text: “应该不会。”{n}他耸了耸肩。{/n}“除非他还有什么其他隐疾，否则他很快就能恢复健康，不会有什么大问题。无论如何，比起让他冒着生命危险见证这场谈话，保持湮没无闻才是更安全的选择。”
languages.original_text: "Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

traits.locale_text: “应该不会。”{n}他耸了耸肩。{/n}“除非他还有什么其他隐疾，否则他很快就能恢复健康，不会有什么大问题。无论如何，比起让他冒着生命危险见证这场谈话，保持湮没无闻才是更安全的选择。”

languages.text: «Es probable». {n}Se encoge de hombros.{/n} «A no ser que sufriera alguna dolencia oculta, pronto recuperará el conocimiento sin mayores daños. De todos modos, la muerte sería más segura para él que el peligroso privilegio de presenciar esta conversación».
languages.original_text: "Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

traits.locale_text: «Es probable». {n}Se encoge de hombros.{/n} «A no ser que sufriera alguna dolencia oculta, pronto recuperará el conocimiento sin mayores daños. De todos modos, la muerte sería más segura para él que el peligroso privilegio de presenciar esta conversación».

languages.text: « Probablement, {n}répond-il en haussant les épaules.{/n} À moins qu'il souffre d'un quelconque mal caché, il devrait bientôt reprendre connaissance. Vous pourrez alors constater par vous-même qu'il n'a subi aucun dégât majeur. Quoi qu'il en soit, il vaut mieux pour lui qu'il soit actuellement inconscient plutôt que d'avoir le dangereux privilège d'assister à cette conversation. »
languages.original_text: "Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

traits.locale_text: « Probablement, {n}répond-il en haussant les épaules.{/n} À moins qu'il souffre d'un quelconque mal caché, il devrait bientôt reprendre connaissance. Vous pourrez alors constater par vous-même qu'il n'a subi aucun dégât majeur. Quoi qu'il en soit, il vaut mieux pour lui qu'il soit actuellement inconscient plutôt que d'avoir le dangereux privilège d'assister à cette conversation. »

languages.text: "Wahrscheinlich." {n}Er zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Wenn er keine versteckten Krankheiten hat, wird er bald ohne größere Schäden wieder zu sich kommen. Jedenfalls ist Unwissenheit für ihn viel sicherer als das gefährliche Privileg, Zeuge dieser Unterhaltung zu werden."
languages.original_text: "Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Wahrscheinlich." {n}Er zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Wenn er keine versteckten Krankheiten hat, wird er bald ohne größere Schäden wieder zu sich kommen. Jedenfalls ist Unwissenheit für ihn viel sicherer als das gefährliche Privileg, Zeuge dieser Unterhaltung zu werden."

languages.text: "Muhtemelen." {n}Omuzlarını silkiyor.{/n} "Kendini belli etmeyen bir hastalığa yakalanmadıysa yakında ciddi bir hasar olmaksızın kendine gelecektir. Tabii bu konuşmaya şahit olma ayrıcalığının yaratacağı tehlikedense kendinde olmaması daha iyi."
languages.original_text: "Probably." {n}He shrugs.{/n} "Unless he suffered from hidden ailments, he will soon come to without any major damage to his health. Either way, oblivion is a far safer option for him than the dangerous privilege of being a witness to this conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Muhtemelen." {n}Omuzlarını silkiyor.{/n} "Kendini belli etmeyen bir hastalığa yakalanmadıysa yakında ciddi bir sağlık sorunu olmadan kendine gelecektir. Yine de bu konuşmaya şahit olma ayrıcalığının yaratacağı tehlikedense kendinde olmaması daha iyi."
